people_also_ask.heading: The name Half-Life was chosen because it was evocative of the theme, not clichéd, and had a corresponding visual symbol: the Greek letter λ (lower-case lambda), which represents the decay constant in the half-life equation.
people_also_ask.title: Half-Life (video game) - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: When focusing on the main objectives, Half-Life is about 12 Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 15½ Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is Half-Life? | HowLongToBeat

people_also_ask.heading: The time required for a biological system, such as that of a human, to eliminate, by natural processes, half of the amount of a substance (such as a radioactive material) that has entered it.
